Row.Name: Install
Row.Description: Run as part of the standard install process.

Row.Name: BetaInstall
Row.Description: Run as part of an upgrade from Profiles RNS Beta.

Row.Name: UpdateCore
Row.Description: Updates Core tables based on changes to Extended tables.

Row.Name: NightlyFull
Row.Description: Run approximately nightly to update Extended and Core tables.

Row.Name: WeeklyFull
Row.Description: Run approximately weekly to update Extended and Core tables.

Row.Name: MonthlyFull
Row.Description: Run approximately montly to update Extended and Core tables.

Row.Name: NightlyExtended
Row.Description: Updates Extended tables whose data change frequently.

Row.Name: WeeklyEntended
Row.Description: Updates Extended tables whose data change less often or are slow to process.

Row.Name: MonthlyExtended
Row.Description: Updates Extended tables whose data take a very long time to process.
